content: Yes, I am aware of Project Catalyst. It is an initiative by Apple to encourage developers to create innovative and engaging experiences on the iOS platform using new technologies and tools. The project provides resources and support for developers to build new features and capabilities into their apps using Apple's latest technologies, such as ARKit, Core ML, and SiriKit. The goal of the project is to help developers create more powerful and engaging apps that take advantage of the unique capabilities of Apple devices.
